name: Prolonging the Party
description:
Party on! Do you have what it takes to keep the party going and make it to that giant disco in the sky? Find out in this time-pressure platformer! This is my submission for the 'Extra' category of ludum dare 50.

Controls:

keyboard key notes: these names are for qwerty, but it should still be the bottom left two buttons even on non-qwerty keyboards. I don't have a non-qwerty keyboard to test with, so let me know if it works or doesn't work for you!

wasd/arrow keys/d-pad
moveup/w/c/space bar/a button
jump
x key / x button
attackz key / b button
talk/interact
